main_definition: A playlist is a collection of songs or audio files organized in a specific order to be played sequentially, often used with digital music services.

meanings_and_examples.example: I created a Spotify playlist with my favorite pop and rock songs.
When watching this movie, the soundtrack was featured as a separate playlist on Netflix.
The professor shared an educational playlist with recorded lectures and supplemental audio material.
I have a dedicated workout playlist on my Apple Music that helps me stay motivated during exercise sessions.
